document_data.caption: A map showing Muirenon Lake amongst the Teardrops in Narfell.
document_data.name: Muirenon Lake
document_data.mainbody: '''Muirenon Lake''' was the second-largest lake forming the [[Teardrops]] in [[Narfell]].
document_data.Geography: Muirenon Lake was the center-most and longest of the lakes forming the Teardrops. It was connected to the lakes [[Lake Mereth|Mereth]] and [[Lake Muskar|Muskar]] by small rivers.
document_data.Inhabitants: The [[Ragnor (tribe)|Ragnor]] tribe lived along the northern Teardrop lakes of Muirenon and Muskar.
